abstract: News Corporation bought a 19.9 percent stake in the Chinese company Bona Film Group, continuing the integration of Hollywood with the Chinese movie business.
snippet: News Corporation bought a 19.9 percent stake in the Chinese company Bona Film Group, continuing the integration of Hollywood with the Chinese movie business.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The integration of Hollywood’s film business with that of China continued Monday as the Bona Film Group, a Chinese movie company, announced that News Corporation, the owner of 20th Century Fox, had acquired a 19.9 percent stake in the company.

headline.main: News Corp. Acquires Stake in Chinese Movie Company
